response.summary: Professional in applied chemical engineering with an emphasis on research processes that involve the improvement of products in the oleochemical industry. Researcher with experience in the use of natural resources to be part of more sustainable and environmentally responsible production processes.
response.skills: Microsoft Office, Matlab, Microsoft Word, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Excel, Aspen Plus, Aspen Hysys, Aspen Properties, AutoCAD, Microsoft Visio, Microsoft Outlook, Visual Basic, Inglés, Planificación estratégica, Strategic Planning, PowerPoint, Español, Spanish, Aspen HYSYS, Investigación y desarrollo

profile_positions.description:
•	Make conceptual, basic, and detailed engineering in the oil and gas industry including technical documentation, drawings, data sheets and risk analysis workshops. 
•	Make presentations to the engineering management on assigned technical issues
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Formulation of a simulation model that includes every single stage (palm oil refining and biodiesel production) with the engineering team to enhance the plant production.
•	Perform the information extraction from the biodiesel plant for the construction of the simulation model, such as data sheets and historical records
profile_positions.title: Research Engineer

profile_positions.description: Support the identification and invitation management for the articles evaluations.  Support the implementation of the editorial management application using Open Journal System.  Presentation of reports about journal’s management
profile_positions.title: Editorial Assistant

profile_positions.description: •	Execute the simulation and plant design establishing the sensibility that the raw material has in every stage of the process in the Ecodiesel’s biodiesel production plant.
profile_positions.title: Simulation Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Characterization of products using Gas Chromatography to issue the quality certificates.
•	Analyze the refinery stages to identify the recovery of phytonutrients.
profile_positions.title: Trainee Research Development

profile_positions.description: Asistir a estudiantes de bachillerato y universidad en dudas que tuvieran sobre temas complejos en Química, Matemática, Física e Ingles
profile_positions.title: Profesor de clases particulares

company.name: Worley
company.description:
Worley is a leading global provider of professional services in the energy, chemicals and resources sectors. We partner with our customers to address their most critical challenges at every stage of their projects: from initial concepts to sustaining and enhancing their assets. And we provide smarter, bolder solutions while delivering on our own sustainability commitments.

We are 51,000 bright minds across 46 countries all driven by a common purpose – delivering a more sustainable world. While working to fulfill our ambition to be recognized globally as a leader in sustainability solutions.
